2.caption_en:
A slide comparing three modern platform types — C2C Marketplace (Airbnb), B2B IoT Platform (MindSphere), and B2C Sharing Platform (Lyft) — each shown with a logo and a short description.

{
  "artifact_type": "informational slide",
  "title": "To understand the architecture of modern platforms we provide a closer look at three different types of platforms",
  "layout": {
    "columns": 3,
    "header_style": "teal banner above each column",
    "content_boxes": "light gray panels containing logos and descriptive text"
  },
  "columns": [
    {
      "platform_type": "C2C Marketplace",
      "example": "Airbnb",
      "logo_present": true,
      "description": "Founded in 2008, San Francisco-based Airbnb is a community marketplace with over 7 million accommodations and more than 40,000 unique Experiences for customers to book on the company's website or through its iOS and Android applications."
    },
    {
      "platform_type": "B2B IoT Platform",
      "example": "MindSphere",
      "logo_present": true,
      "description": "MindSphere is an Industrial IoT platform to connect machines, devices and provides services/insights based on the collected data. It's based on open standards to allow maximum interconnectivity."
    },
    {
      "platform_type": "B2C Sharing Platform",
      "example": "Lyft",
      "logo_present": true,
      "description": "Lyft was founded in 2012 and is one of the largest transportation networks in the United States and Canada. Brings together rideshare, bikes, scooters, car rentals and transit all in one platform."
    }
  ],
  "detected_logos": [
    "airbnb",
    "MindSphere",
    "lyft"
  ],
  "dominant_colors": [
    "teal",
    "light gray",
    "coral (Airbnb logo)",
    "mint/teal (MindSphere)",
    "magenta/pink (Lyft)"
  ],
  "language": "English",
  "ocr_excerpt": "To understand the architecture of modern platforms we provide a closer look at three different types of platforms ... Founded in 2008, San Francisco-based Airbnb is a community marketplace with over 7 million accommodations ... Mindsphere is an Industrial IoT platform to connect machines, devices and provides services/insights ... Lyft was founded in 2012 and is one of the largest transportation networks in the United States and Canada ..."
}
